name: .DGC File Extension
summary: Learn about .DGC files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Archive created by DGCA (DigitalGCodecArchiver), a file compression utility created by Japanese developer Shin-ichi Tsuruta; saves one or more files in a compressed format and can compress at better ratios than the .ZIP format.

content: DGC files are sometimes used for distributing content for 2D fighting games developed with the MUGEN game engine.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
